HOME.TITLE: Turn Waste into Rewards
HOME.DESCRIPTION: Recycle your materials and earn points redeemable for amazing rewards
HOME.TESTIMONIAL_1: EcoPoints made recycling fun and rewarding. I've earned over 2000 points in just 3 months!
HOME.TESTIMONIAL_2: The easiest way to contribute to the environment while getting something back. Highly recommend!

ABOUT.TITLE: About EcoPoints
ABOUT.SUBTITLE: Our mission to make recycling rewarding
ABOUT.HISTORY_CONTENT: Founded in 2023, EcoPoints began as a small initiative to encourage recycling in our community and has grown into a nationwide movement.
ABOUT.MISSION_CONTENT: We believe recycling should be rewarding. Our platform connects environmentally conscious individuals with businesses that value sustainability.
ABOUT.TEAM_CONTENT: We're a diverse group of environmentalists, technologists, and business professionals united by our passion for sustainability.
